mapper.select: SELECT w.warehouseCode ,w.warehouseName ,w.warehouseType ,w.totalStock ,w.martCode ,w.ID ,w.regDate ,s.shelfCode ,s.warehouseCode ,s.shelfName ,s.totalStock ,s.martCode ,s.ID ,s.regDate FROM tb_warehouse AS w inner join tb_shelf AS s on w.warehouseCode = s.warehouseCode WHERE w.martCode = #{martCode} AND s.martCode = #{martCode};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_warehouse (warehouseName, warehouseType, totalStock, martCode, ID, regDate) VALUES (#{warehouseName}, #{warehouseType}, 0, #{martCode}, #{ID}, NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT warehouseCode, warehouseName, martCode FROM tb_warehouse WHERE martCode = #{martCode}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_shelf (warehouseCode, shelfName, martCode, ID, regDate) VALUES (#{warehouseCode}, #{shelfName}, #{martCode}, #{ID}, NOW())
INSERT INTO tb_showcase (showcasePlace, martCode, ID, regDate) VALUES (#{showcasePlace}, #{martCode}, #{ID}, NOW())
